sentences.sentence: A hypnotherapist will hypnotize you and will stop you from smoking.
sentences.translation: 催眠疗法医生将对你进行催眠，帮你戒烟。

sentences.sentence: One is to have a one-to-one consultation with a qualified clinical hypnotherapist and the other is to use hypnotherapy products at home.
sentences.translation: 一方面是为了有一对一咨询，符合条件的临床催眠，另外一种方式是使用催眠产品在家。
